title: The latest version permanently deleted my files
body:
I don't even understand how this is possible.
I started the converting and got a permission error on Windows.
Then I checked the temp folder that I set to the Desktop and it DELETED MOST OF MY SHORTCUTS.
Ok...
Then I set the temp folder to the Pictures folder.
Again permission error and not it permanently deleted an entire folder full with pictures that didn't even have anything to do with Video2x. I mean it wasn't the temp folder or the folder to be converted or anything.
Your software just deleted a folder in the Pictures folder and I lost several pictures of mine.
How is this even possible? This is some serious bug.

I'm sending you the log file but my pictures are gone forever as they are not even in the trashcan.
[video2x_error.log](https://github.com/k4yt3x/video2x/files/9779031/video2x_error.log)
